name: Crazy Pizza Man FREE - Master Jumping Pie Maker Game
name_original: Crazy Pizza Man FREE - Master Jumping Pie Maker Game
description:
Crazy times are in store for the Pizza Man. Help his jump from pizza pie to the next pizza pie. Get blasted through a tomato bottle. Gather up slices of pepperoni or tomato. This is crazy fun! Use your skills to help the Crazy Pizza Man capture all the condiments and reach each achievement.

EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap to Jump from one pizza to the next.
- Tap again while airborne to spring further
- Successfully land on each pizza pie

FEATURES:
- Tap addictive game play
- Numerous levels
- Endless Run Mode. How far can you go?

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Crazy Pizza Man FREE’ Now!!!
